parameters: "Curse Energy and First Class Perpetual Motion"

"It's a scene from a variety show that I saw in my childhood. I still remember it vividly. Make a magnetically rotating propeller and attach it to a small car toy. And an elderly man who pointed to a self-propelled toy and declared, "This is a perpetual motion," was applauded in the program. 』\
"When I was young, I was thrilled that a car could run forever with magnets and propellers.
However, even if you make a similar device, it does not work well.
The propeller turns a little and stops immediately. 』\
"When I think about it now, I used an" electric "magnet in that variety show. In other words, it's just a motor. It's not a perpetual motion or anything. It's a malicious program.
At that time, I didn't know that, and I was repeating trial and error without any fruit. 』\
"I think it was before I went to junior high school over time. Find out on the Internet that there is no perpetual motion in the world.
Until today, it has been attempted to create perpetual motion a tremendous number of times.
However, the existence of perpetual motion has been denied by the establishment of the basic principle of thermodynamics. 』\

"Establishment of the basic principle of thermodynamics means that moving something causes energy loss such as friction. Unless this is reduced to zero, no institution can continue to operate without additional energy.
I was deeply disappointed that there was no infinite energy in this world. 』\
"But at the same time, I was excited to be in the field where I could be a leader.
Since then, I have been captivated by the romance of a perpetual motion and have devoted my life to the past. And I finally reach the truth. 』\
"Okiku doll with growing hair. "Enfield poltergeist" where furniture moves, fires occur, and humans are lifted in the air. A "cursed doll" that returns even if you throw it away.
Spells, Dharani, spells. A paranormal phenomenon commonly called a psychic phenomenon. 』\
"If these spiritual disorders were to be true, I suddenly wondered if it was a practical first-class perpetual motion.
Not long ago, I participated in a dinner called the Bizarre Realization Society.

It is said that the strange opposite sex realization society cannot actually occur. A meeting to deepen exchanges, wishing for the development and prayers of unknown fields. ... In other words, it's a party where idiots chasing dreams lick their wounds. 』\
"I don't remember having a big conversation, but I remember having a little chat with a man who was studying psychic phenomena on the spot.
If you can get in touch with him, or ... there may be developments in your research.
I searched for his business card and contacted him. 』\
"Thus, I, no, what I was, has reigned as a permanent being from the origin of the universe to the present. 』\
"Dedicate this anguish to all life. 』\Is this Menoko's house? Fufu, it's a cute house.
